description:
Shina has to choose whether she’ll kill Seiya or love him. When she sees Aioria try to kill Seiya, she decides to love him. During the battle between Aioria and Seiya, she gets badly injured in order to protect Seiya, when 3 Silver Saints, Sirius, Dios and Argetti come. They try to kill Seiya because their comrades were killed by Seiya. Seiya gets cornered but the Gold Cloth appears to help him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A decisão da Armadura de Sagitário
Kamen ga Sakebu! Ai ka Shi ka
The Mask Screams! Either Love or Death?
¡La máscara grita! ¿El amor o la muerte?
仮面が叫ぶ! 愛か死か
